projects.name: Certificate Record System
projects.description: Manages records of certificates issued for a specific business and provides functionality to print these certificates. It maintains a comprehensive database of all issued certificates, including details such as certificate ID, issuance date, recipient information, and the purpose of the certificate.

projects.name: PhotoVideography Appointment
projects.description: An appointment management system designed for photographers and videographers, including a robust admin interface. This system allows admins to manage client appointments efficiently, ensuring streamlined operations and improved client service.
